parameters.definition: Total acres of land available for growing turnips and pumpkins
Time required for watering per acre of turnips
Pesticide cost per acre of turnips
Time required for watering per acre of pumpkins
Pesticide cost per acre of pumpkins

description: A farmer has \param{TotalAcres} acres of land to grow turnips and pumpkins. Turnips require \param{WateringTurnips} minutes of watering and $\param{PesticideTurnips} worth of pesticide per acre. Pumpkins require \param{WateringPumpkins} minutes of watering and $\param{PesticidePumpkins} worth of pesticide per acre. The farmer has \param{TotalWateringTime} minutes available for watering and $\param{TotalPesticideBudget} available to spend on pesticide. If the revenue per acre of turnips is $\param{RevenueTurnips} and the revenue per acre of pumpkins is $\param{RevenuePumpkins}, how many acres of each should he grow to maximize his revenue.
